segments.text: Oh no . I broke your vase accidentally .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I bumped it by accident , but I didn't mean to do it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel miserable . Can I give you money for it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I shouldn't have put it here . Someone was bound to bump it eventually .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First I was late for school this morning , and now I broke your vase . This isn't my day !
segments.speaker: S2
